channel.title: Option to show colour in action keyboard
channel.description: I suspect this might be an iOS limitation, but having the option to show colours in the actions keyboards could be useful. Either colour the icon itself or the key blob surrounding it. (On the other hand it might detract from the elegant simplicity.)
